Message.Title: Message does not exist for the message code {0} ru-RU
Message.Description: Error message when the error code is not found

Message.Title: Short name is required ru-RU
Message.Description: Generated by entity creator when creating and entity

Message.Title: Logout was successful ru-RU
Message.Description: Generated by login screen after the logout was successful

Message.Title: Login was successful ru-RU
Message.Description: Generated by login screen after the logout was successful

Message.Title: Connection string not found for Application = {0} ru-RU
Message.Description: Generated by ConnectionStringBL.Get() if connection infromation is not configured in database for given application

Message.Title: RelationshipType Short Name cannot be Empty ru-RU
Message.Description: Genereted by RelationshipType Screen if ShortName is empty

Message.Title: RelationshipType Long Name cannot be Empty ru-RU
Message.Description: Genereted by RelationshipType Screen if LongName is empty

Message.Title: Could not load Category with Id = {0} ru-RU
Message.Description: Genereted by Create Category page from Maintain Hierarchy page.
